schema_version.hidden comment: Bump the default in the subclasses.

step_run.description: Reference to analysis step run in pipeline
step_run.title: Analysis step run

___href.comment: Internal webapp URL for document file

quality_metric_of.description: One or more files that this metric either applies to or is calculated from.
quality_metric_of.title: Files

items.description: A particular file associated with this quality metric.
items.comment: See file.json for a list of available identifiers.
items.title: File

description: Schema for reporting histone modification ChIP-seq quality metrics
title: Histone modification ChIP-seq quality metric

___nreads.description: # of starting reads in the pool (if replicated) or experiment (if unreplicated)
___nreads.title: # of reads

___nreads_in_peaks.description: # of reads that fall within peaks.
___nreads_in_peaks.title: # of reads in peaks

___Ft.description: Fraction reads in replicated/stable narrowPeaks (FRiP) from true replicates
___Ft.title: FRiP score from true replicate peaks

___npeak_overlap.description: # peaks overlapping with true replicate or pooled pseudoreplicate peaks
___npeak_overlap.title: # of overlapping peaks

___F2.description: Fraction reads in replicated/stable narrowPeaks (FRiP) from replicate 2 self-pseudoreplicates
___F2.title: FRiP score from rep2 self-pseudoreplicate peaks

___F1.description: Fraction reads in replicated/stable narrowPeaks (FRiP) from replicate 1 self-pseudoreplicates or the number of stable peaks that pass internal pseudoreplication,  when self-pseudoreplication is done on unreplicated experiments.
___F1.title: FRiP score from rep1 self-pseudoreplicate peaks

___Fp.description: Fraction reads in replicated/stable narrowPeaks (FRiP) from pooled pseudoreplicates
___Fp.title: FRiP score from pooled pseudoreplicate peaks
